messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Somebody from the Capital One bank called saying there's a bag in the bank, and she said, 'I gotta go, I gotta go,' and hung up the phone.
We’re receiving another call. They believe a robbery is in progress. Can you confirm?
Yes, there’s a robbery in progress. The subject is in the back of the bank.
How many robbers are there? Can you describe them?
He has a hostage. The robber has a black handgun and is behind the tellers.
We have units on the way, and SWAT is being dispatched. Can you describe the robber’s appearance?
He's wearing a gray hooded sweatshirt.
Are there any other suspects or exits we need to be aware of?
The robber said there are three other suspects outside and he has some type of bomb on the counter.
Stay calm. We’re setting up a staging area and securing the perimeter. Can you keep an eye on the exits and let us know if you see any more suspects?
I see a black SUV with tinted windows parked outside.
We have officers checking the parking lot. Is the SUV occupied?
I can't tell from where I am. The SUV windows are too dark.
Understood. We have units moving in. The situation is being handled. Try to stay in a safe spot.
Okay, I’ll stay where I am.
We’ve got a hostage on the move with the suspect in sight. Keep your head down.
Smoke just went off inside the bank.
Stay clear of the building. Shots fired, suspect is down. Do we have any more suspects?
No, I think the other suspects might have been a bluff. The robber wanted us to think there were more.
Copy that. We’re securing the area. Are there any more hostages inside?
No, I have five of the six employees with me. The last one is outside now.
Alright, we’re clearing the building. We'll keep you updated.
